movie.title: Serendip
movie.description_intro: After months of pooling resources, Andrea finally joins Antonio in Sri Lanka, where he is already working to organize the delivery of school supplies for the children of Ambewela. After the successful initial phase, Take Me Back guys come into contact with voices, faces and ideas until they become witnesses of stories and live spectators of a faraway place, a place that screams diversity, change and possibility. What the two friends couldn't predict was how much the journey itself would become their path, allowing them to bring back home more than the feeling of having done something great.
movie.description_full: After months of pooling resources, Andrea finally joins Antonio in Sri Lanka, where he is already working to organize the delivery of school supplies for the children of Ambewela. After the successful initial phase, Take Me Back guys come into contact with voices, faces and ideas until they become witnesses of stories and live spectators of a faraway place, a place that screams diversity, change and possibility. What the two friends couldn't predict was how much the journey itself would become their path, allowing them to bring back home more than the feeling of having done something great.

movies.title: The Great Invisible
movies.summary: On April 20, 2010, the Deepwater Horizon oil rig exploded in the Gulf of Mexico. It killed 11 workers and caused the worst oil spill in American history. The explosion still haunts the lives of those most intimately affected, though the story has long ago faded from the front page. At once a fascinating corporate thriller, a heartbreaking human drama and a peek inside the walls of the secretive oil industry, "The Great Invisible" is the first documentary feature to go beyond the media coverage to examine the crisis in depth through the eyes of oil executives, survivors and Gulf Coast residents who experienced it first-hand and then were left to pick up the pieces while the world moved on.

movies.title: Mucho Mucho Amor: The Legend of Walter Mercado
movies.title_english: Mucho Mucho Amor: The Legend of Walter Mercado
movies.title_long: Mucho Mucho Amor: The Legend of Walter Mercado (2020)
movies.summary: Once the world's most famous astrologer, Walter Mercado seeks to resurrect a forgotten legacy. Raised in the sugar cane fields of Puerto Rico, Walter grew up to become a gender non-conforming, cape-wearing psychic whose televised horoscopes reached 120 million Latinx viewers a day for 30 years before he mysteriously disappeared.

movies.title: McLaren
movies.summary: The story of Bruce McLaren, the New Zealander who founded the McLaren Motor Racing team. A man who showed the world that a man of humble beginnings could take on the elite of motor racing and win.
movies.description_full: The story of Bruce McLaren, the New Zealander who founded the McLaren Motor Racing team. A man who showed the world that a man of humble beginnings could take on the elite of motor racing and win.

movies.title: Dreaming the Quiet Man
movies.summary: This documentary delves into the psyche of John Ford and his twenty year struggle to bring his homage to his parents homeland to the screen.
movies.description_full: This documentary delves into the psyche of John Ford and his twenty year struggle to bring his homage to his parents homeland to the screen.
